bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
ModelCheckpoint class attempts to save a model file on every batch run. <denchmark-h:h3>Additional context</denchmark-h>
I've created a simple trainer with a checkpoint, passing save_best_k=-1. My trainer only has a training step configured. The model checkpoint class is being called at the end of each batch run here -
pytorch-lightning/pytorch_lightning/trainer/training_loop.py
Line 741 in 732eaee
self.checkpoint_callback.on_validation_end(self, self.get_model())
This seems to be because train_step_only flag is active in my case, and the relevant code that triggers the model save is here -
pytorch-lightning/pytorch_lightning/trainer/training_loop.py
Line 457 in 732eaee
self.call_checkpoint_callback()

comments.comment: I tested it on the latest master branch and cannot reproduce what you described. It looks like this was fixed (the train_step_only variable is not there anymore). Can you confirm this?
